title: Reminder to the Skin Team that Kandy Kayn needs to be a thing

replies.body: https://imgur.com/3BeSsV1

>
> https://imgur.com/3BeSsV1

Can I misinterpret this as a yes?  :3
Hey, I won't tell you how to live your life. :P

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=FPYLLtj9,comment-id=000200020000,timestamp=2017-10-27T22:26:39.343+0000)
>
> Hey, I won't tell you how to live your life. :P

And what about 4 seasons Zyra ? :D
I want this skin so badly.

> [{quoted}](name=Zatsukino,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=FPYLLtj9,comment-id=0002000200000000,timestamp=2017-10-27T22:34:47.417+0000)
>
> And what about 4 seasons Zyra ? :D

omg, mandatory, better concept than Elementalist Lux, zomg, +1 internets won.

> [{quoted}](name=Zatsukino,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=FPYLLtj9,comment-id=0002000200000000,timestamp=2017-10-27T22:34:47.417+0000)
>
> And what about 4 seasons Zyra ? :D

That'd be amazing! {{sticker:sg-lux}}

Hey Riot if its cool with you can anyone at the skins team check this [**POST**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/UJGEOZT9-question-for-riot-hopefully-they-answer) out and write an answer to this?
This post is asking us to confirm/deny if we're making something/planning to make something, which isn't something we're able to disclose, unfortunately. I do think it's a cool idea, though! :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=FPYLLtj9,comment-id=00020002000000010000,timestamp=2017-10-30T21:09:11.945+0000)
>
> This post is asking us to confirm/deny if we're making something/planning to make something, which isn't something we're able to disclose, unfortunately. I do think it's a cool idea, though! :)

Tbh, I'd rather have a serious skin for Kayn.

I know this piece of artwork is just the early draft of the skin, but I believe I speak for the entire community when I say I LOVE IT.
Will it be a legendary skin? I would love to have it as an entire theme.
Art {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
will you change your name to kandykhaos for this snowdown?

I will now. 

{{sticker:sg-lux}}
He's gonna have to get in line behind Bee Sin, Nekko, and Sandy Swain.
Holy shit Nekko

NEKKO I'M SCREAMING.




....finally a friend for Kitty Katerina
Ok.... I don't get it...
Neko is Japanese for cat. Catboy Ekko. Neko Ekko. Nekko.
Japanese word for cat is neko.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot jinxylord,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=FPYLLtj9,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-10-27T21:31:59.728+0000)
>
> He's gonna have to get in line behind Bee Sin, Nekko, and Sandy Swain.

I don't want to eat my shoe please >.>
Rito pls Shen Pie skin
How about Moo-Kong?
Wait so all 3 of these are happening? That's sick.

>Bee Sin

This is relevant:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xs-tl6GBOBo

Because it's not like it's easy to get away from a Lee, now is there!? You don't have a piece of elastic around a Bee Sin - in Soviet Russia, Bee Sin keep a leash on you!

But let me see if I get this right:
Short leash, okay, that one's easy...

https://pre00.deviantart.net/6f17/th/pre/i/2012/213/2/1/karma__s_carrysitting_service_by_chi_chirumiru-d59fum4.png

And then we got Beekeeper Singed...okay, now there is a story about support Singed that I'M NOT AT ALL GONNA GET INTO...

So, to the big question: Did we just hear it here first, about the Support bee meta?

As a Support main myself, it's not like it's slave work or anything [...], but the question is there. Considering the ADC does want the Support nearby at all times, it's suggesting he's a wannabe(e) beekeeper, doesn't it?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Bruh, you just blew up so many people's minds with Nekko.
Don't forget Jhingerbread Man
Avatar Taliyah
I understand that in that skin Rhaast will be a candy monster, but what will Shadow Assassin be? A chef?
Ugh excuse me. If anything, Rhaast would be Krampus.

It's only fitting that if Kayn yields to his candy instincts he becomes the candy.

If he resists them and masters his inner urges, he becomes a master confectioner.

He can be my Shokugeki No Souma  - style sexy anime chef.

https://i.imgur.com/JlGyuiS.jpg

Riot please

https://ibhuluimcom-a.akamaihd.net/ib.huluim.com/show/23107?region=US&size=952x536

Shadow assassin = Santa
Rhaast = Krampus
Kayn normal = Elf with candy cane as weapon
Essentially Shadow Assassin would be Slay Belle Katarina and Rhaast would be Santa Gragas.
And Christmas Eve
and Can**D CANE ** {{champion:75}}

We need Amoomoo (like moo cow Alistar but for Amumu)
He would cry milk.  It would be great.
What, no Citizen Kayn?
How about Christmas Ornnament
I agree.

If Nekko, Bee Sin, and Sandy Swain aren't actually happening, riot needs to fucking fIX THEIR PRIORITIES

-ok actually tho pls.-
its still haloween month calm down

> [{quoted}](name=PhantomAxolotl,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=FPYLLtj9,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-10-27T16:26:17.615+0000)
>
> GIVE US KANDY KAYN

i'd much rather

https://imgur.com/a/oI9mV

Masked Kayn
candy queen zyra plz
A reminder that it won't happen this year.
Christmas Eve make it happen{{champion:28}}
No you can just wait a while like all us pantheon lovers waited for the baker skin. {{champion:80}}
But you can release Baker Panth any day. Candy Kayn can only happen once a year
